Context:
The George Brown College Foundation creates endowment scholarships and student awards using donor contributions. Donors can invest an amount in perpetuity, with the annual interest generating as a student award. Endowments can be named after the donor(s). Some donors may make annual donations to keep award values consistent. The principal in an endowment is never expended. The GBC Financial Aid Office and Faculty determine the annual student selection based on established criteria.

For more information about endowments, contact Krisztina Arany at 416-415-5000 ext.: 4356 or karany@georgebrown.ca.

Website contacts: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

Note: The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
